meanings.sent1: The puppy was so frolicky, chasing its tail around the yard.
meanings.sent2: Children at the park were frolicky, laughing and playing tag.
meanings.sent3: The frolicky kitten pounced on a ball of yarn, thinking it was a mouse.
meanings.sent4: The frolicky breeze danced through the trees, rustling the leaves.
meanings.sent5: Her frolicky spirit was contagious, bringing smiles to everyone around her.

meanings.sent1: The frolicky squirrel leaped from branch to branch in the tree.
meanings.sent2: The children's frolicky antics entertained the adults at the party.
meanings.sent3: The frolicky puppy rolled around in the grass, chasing its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The frolicky waves crashed against the shore, inviting surfers to play.
meanings.sent5: His frolicky nature made him a favorite among the neighborhood kids.

meanings.definition: Characterized by lively and carefree activity
meanings.sent1: The frolicky music at the festival had everyone dancing joyfully.
meanings.sent2: The frolicky atmosphere of the carnival filled the air with laughter.
meanings.sent3: The frolicky squirrel scampered up the tree, looking for nuts to store.
meanings.sent4: The frolicky stream meandered through the meadow, glistening in the sun.
meanings.sent5: In the frolicky meadow, children ran and played without a care in the world.
